entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 3. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 70 percent chance of showers early this evening. 70 percent chance of showers near the Cariboo mountains late this evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 then diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 5:19 PM PDT Sunday 9 April 2023
